item.pedestals.linkingtool.tool_linked: Sending Items to These Pedestal Locations:
jei.pedestals.linkingtool.desc: Shift-R-Click the pedestal Receiving items to select it, Shift-R-Click on the pedestal Sending Items to link the two pedestals. Used In crafting to create most base items in the mod.
jei.pedestals.tagtool.desc: With an item in your off hand, r-click the tag tool in the air. In chat the list of tags the item has will appear.
jei.pedestals.upgradetool.desc: Right Click, with this in hand, on an upgraded pedestal to get details about the upgrade.
jei.pedestals.itemcolorpallet.desc: Crafted from Color Pallets and Red/Green/Blue dyes. Can be re-colored.
jei.pedestals.itemcolorpalletdefault.des: To make Colored Pallets: Throw Red/Green/Blue Dye on the ground, then throw as many Color Pallets as you want colored down, r-click on the ground with the Linking Tool and the Colored Pallets will be created.
jei.pedestals.upgradespeed.desc: Use on a Pedestal to Increase the Speed at which it transfers items.
jei.pedestals.upgradecapacity.desc: Use on a Pedestal to Increase the Amount of Items transferred at a time.
jei.pedestals.bookspeed.desc: Will only accept the Speed Enchant when being enchanted. Can only add enchant from book to upgrades with the Anvil Upgrade.
jei.pedestals.bookcapacity.desc: Will only accept the Capacity Enchant when being enchanted. Can only add enchant from book to upgrades with the Anvil Upgrade.
jei.pedestals.bookrange.desc: Will only accept the Range Enchant when being enchanted. Can only add enchant from book to upgrades with the Anvil Upgrade.
jei.pedestals.bookarea.desc: Will only accept the Area Enchant when being enchanted. Can only add enchant from book to upgrades with the Anvil Upgrade.
jei.pedestals.bookadvanced.desc: Will only accept the Advanced Enchant when being enchanted. Can only add enchant from book to upgrades with the Anvil Upgrade.
jei.pedestals.attack.desc: Attacks Entities in the area around it, Placing a Block of Netherite/Emerald/Diamond/Gold/Iron Under the pedestal will change what is attacked. Putting a sword into the pedestal will increase the damage delt, Sharpness/Bane/Smite on the sword also increases attack damage.
death.attack.pedestal1: %1$s was poked one to many times
death.attack.pedestal6: %1$s caught a sword with their face
death.attack.pedestal8: %1$s wasn't carring the knife properly and slipped
jei.pedestals.breaker.desc: This Upgrade will Break the Block Below The Pedestal, Range Makes it break a block farther down. If a Pickaxe is put in the pedestal, the breaker will use that tool to break blocks.
jei.pedestals.chopper.desc: This Upgrade will break tree blocks in an area around the pedestal, If an Axe is put in the pedestal, the Chopper will use that tool to chop blocks.
jei.pedestals.choppershrooms.desc: This Upgrade will break Mushroom/Nether Shroom blocks in an area around the pedestal, If an Axe is put in the pedestal, the Chopper will use that tool to chop blocks.
jei.pedestals.cobble.desc: This Will Generate Cobblestone, If a stack exists in the buffer, 1 Stack of cobblestone will always be available in the pedestal. You Can drop Cobble on the pedestal to store it in the buffer. The buffer holds ~2.1 billion cobble
jei.pedestals.crafter1.desc: Place an Inventory Below the Pedestal, The crafter will look at each slot to see if it can craft given the input, If it can, it will craft until 1 item is left in the slot.
jei.pedestals.crafter2.desc: Place an Inventory Below the Pedestal, The crafter will look at every 4 slots to see if it can craft given the inputs, If it can, it will craft until 1 item is left in each slot.
jei.pedestals.crafter3.desc: Place an Inventory Below the Pedestal, The crafter will look at every 9 slots to see if it can craft given the inputs, If it can, it will craft until 1 item is left in each slot.
jei.pedestals.placeholder.desc: Used to fill up a slot in an inventory being used to craft from with the Crafting Upgrades (acts like a blank slot in recipes).
jei.pedestals.crusher.desc: Place an Inventory Below the Pedestal for item inputs, Drop Fuel Items on the Pedestal to fuel it, Outputs come out the top of the pedestal. Can crush Most Ores, Stone, Cobble, Gravel, BlazeRod, SugarCane, Beetroot, P.Potato, Potato, Wheat, Bone, and Vanilla Flowers
jei.pedestals.default.desc: This is used to craft all other upgrades.
jei.pedestals.dropper.desc: Take items from pedestal and drops them above, range effects how far from the top they get dropped.
jei.pedestals.effect.desc: Diffuses a potion Placed in the pedestal to all entities in the area. The potion will be consumed, unless blaze powder has been dropped onto the pedestal to be used as fuel instead. Placing a Block of Netherite/Emerald/Diamond/Gold/Iron Under the pedestal will change what is effected
jei.pedestals.grower.desc: Uses Bonemeal to grow plants and make grass in the area around it.
jei.pedestals.harvester.desc: Will Break Fully Grown Crops in the area around it. If a Hoe tool is placed in the pedestal above, it'll use that when breaking crops.
jei.pedestals.magnet.desc: Will Gather up Items in the area around it and put them in the pedestal.
jei.pedestals.fmagnetitem.desc: Will Gather up Items in the area around it, if they match the items in the below inventory, it will put them in the pedestal.
jei.pedestals.fmagnetitemb.desc: Will Gather up Items in the area around it, if they dont match the items in the below inventory, it will put them in the pedestal.
jei.pedestals.fmagnetitemstack.desc: Will Gather up Items in the area around it, if they match the itemstack in the below inventory, it will put them in the pedestal.
jei.pedestals.fmagnetitemstackb.desc: Will Gather up Items in the area around it, if they dont match the itemstack in the below inventory, it will put them in the pedestal.
jei.pedestals.fmagnetmod.desc: Will Gather up Items in the area around it, and if they match the mod of the items in the below inventory, it will put them in the pedestal.
jei.pedestals.fmagnetmodb.desc: Will Gather up Items in the area around it, and if they dont match the mod of the items in the below inventory, it will put them in the pedestal.
jei.pedestals.planter.desc: Using seeds from the pedestal, this will plant crops in the area around it.
jei.pedestals.rfexport.desc: Place Against a Machine or Insert an Item Needing Supplied with Energy, This upgrade will extract power from the network and into the attached machine or compatible block.
jei.pedestals.rfimport.desc: Place Against a Machine/Block or Insert an Item that Supplies Energy, This upgrade will import power into the network from the attached generator or compatible supplier block.
jei.pedestals.rfrelay.desc: This upgrade can pass energy through pedestals to other energy compatible pedestals.
jei.pedestals.rftank.desc: This upgrade will hold a large amount of energy in the network.
jei.pedestals.rfcrusher.desc: Place an Inventory Below the Pedestal for item inputs, Connect it to the Pedestal Energy Network to Fuel It, Outputs come out the top of the pedestal. Can crush Most Ores, Stone, Cobble, Gravel, BlazeRod, SugarCane, Beetroot, P.Potato, Potato, Wheat, Bone, and Vanilla Flowers
jei.pedestals.rfsmelter.desc: Place an Inventory Below the Pedestal for item inputs, Connect it to the Pedestal Energy Network to Fuel It, Outputs come out the top of the pedestal. Can Smelt anything a Vanila Furnace can.
jei.pedestals.rfsawmill.desc: Place an Inventory Below the Pedestal for item inputs, Connect it to the Pedestal Energy Network to Fuel It, Outputs come out the top of the pedestal. Saws Vanilla Wood Blocks Into other wood blocks, or sticks.
jei.pedestals.rfquarry.desc: Place an Inventory Below the Pedestal for item inputs, Connect it to the Pedestal Energy Network to Fuel It, Outputs come out the top of the pedestal. Will Only Mine Blocks that Match what is in the below inventory.
jei.pedestals.rfquarryb.desc: Place an Inventory Below the Pedestal for item inputs, Connect it to the Pedestal Energy Network to Fuel It, Outputs come out the top of the pedestal. Will Only Mine Blocks that DO NOT Match what is in the below inventory.
jei.pedestals.xpanvil.desc: Needs XP, Place an Inventory below the Pedestal for Items Needing Repaired and Items getting combined. Place Pedestals Around the Upgraded One, NESW, with one space inbetween. Items placed on these 4 pedestals will be combined with the item in the inventory below the upgraded pedestal.
jei.pedestals.xpbottler.desc: Needs XP, Place an inventory below the pedestal, When glass bottles are put in the pedestal and its supplied with XP it will create Bottles Of Enchanting, and put them in the pedestal.
item.pedestals.coin.xpmagnet.chat_rate: Exp Levels Transfered at a Time:
jei.pedestals.xpmagnet.desc: Will Gather up XP in the area around it and store it in the upgrade. Will also Absorb XP from Players Who are up against the pedestal, When linked to another pedestal with an XP upgrade, it will transfer Exp to the linked Pedestal.
item.pedestals.coin.xpdropper.chat_rate: Levels of Exp to Drop at a Time:
jei.pedestals.xpdropper.desc: Needs XP, This will drop it as XP orbs on the ground.
jei.pedestals.xpenchanter.desc: Needs XP, Place an Inventory below the pedestal for enchanting inputs, This grabs enchanting power from up to 3 high bookshelves, Enchanting Power Determines The level this enchants at, Enchants can be applied to anything a vanilla one can do.
item.pedestals.coin.xpgrindstone.chat_ra: Exp Levels Transfered at a Time:
jei.pedestals.xpgrindstone.desc: Place an Inventory below the pedestal for grinding inputs. This upgrade will Grind the enchants off of items and return the unenchanted items to the pedestal, while storing the xp from the process in its buffer, which can be transfered out.
jei.pedestals.export.desc: Takes Items from the pedestal and inserts them into a below inventory.
jei.pedestals.fexportitem.desc: Compares Incoming Items to those in the inventory below. Will only accept and insert matching items.
jei.pedestals.fexportitemstack.desc: Compares Incoming ItemStacks to those in the inventory below. Will only accept and insert matching ItemStacks.
jei.pedestals.fexportmod.desc: Compares Incoming Items to those in the inventory below. Will only accept and insert items from the same Mod.
jei.pedestals.fexportfood.desc: Will only accept and insert food items.
jei.pedestals.fexportenchanted.desc: Will only accept and insert enchanted items.
item.pedestals.coin.xprelay.chat_rate: Exp Levels Transfered at a Time:
jei.pedestals.xprelay.desc: Used as a relay for transferring xp long distances,  When linked to another pedestal with an XP upgrade, it will transfer Exp to the linked Pedestal.
item.pedestals.coin.xptank.chat_rate: Exp Levels Transfered at a Time:
jei.pedestals.xptank.desc: Used to store massive amounts of XP,  When linked to another pedestal with an XP upgrade, it will transfer Exp to the linked Pedestal.
jei.pedestals.fan.desc: Pushes Mobs in the area around it, Placing a Block of Netherite/Emerald/Diamond/Gold/Iron Under the pedestal will change what is pushed. Players can crouch to disable being pushed.
jei.pedestals.filterenchanted.desc: Only accepts Items with enchantments to pass through the pedestal.
jei.pedestals.filterenchantedb.desc: Only accepts Items without enchantments to pass through the pedestal.
jei.pedestals.filterenchantedcount.desc: Checks the number of enchants on the incoming item, if that number matches the Upgrade's count, it'll pass.
jei.pedestals.filterenchantedexact.desc: Compares Incoming Items to those in the inventory below. Checks if the enchants on the incoming item match exactly an enchanted item in the filter.
jei.pedestals.filterenchantedexactb.desc: Compares Incoming Items to those in the inventory below. Checks if the enchants on the incoming item does not exactly match an enchanted item in the filter.
jei.pedestals.filterenchantedfuzzy.desc: Compares Incoming Items to those in the inventory below. Checks if the enchants on the incoming item match any enchanted item, regardless of level, in the filter.
jei.pedestals.filterenchantedfuzzyb.desc: Compares Incoming Items to those in the inventory below. Checks if the enchants on the incoming item do not match any enchanted item, regardless of level, in the filter.
jei.pedestals.filterfood.desc: Only accepts Items that are food to pass through the pedestal.
jei.pedestals.filterfoodb.desc: Only accepts Items that are NOT food to pass through the pedestal.
jei.pedestals.filteritem.desc: Compares Incoming Items to those in the inventory below. Only allows matching Items to pass through the pedestal.
jei.pedestals.filteritemb.desc: Compares Incoming Items to those in the inventory below. Only allows not matching Items to pass through the pedestal.
jei.pedestals.filteritemstack.desc: Compares Incoming Items to those in the inventory below. Only allows Matching ItemStacks to pass through the pedestal.
jei.pedestals.filteritemstackb.desc: Compares Incoming Items to those in the inventory below. Only allows UnMatching ItemStacks to pass through the pedestal.
jei.pedestals.filtermod.desc: Compares Incoming Items to those in the inventory below. Only allows Items from the same mod to pass through the pedestal.
jei.pedestals.filtermodb.desc: Compares Incoming Items to those in the inventory below. Only allows Items NOT from the same mod to pass through the pedestal.
jei.pedestals.filtertag.desc: Compares Incoming Items to those in the inventory below. Only allows Items that match the tag name of renamed items to pass through the pedestal.
jei.pedestals.filtertagb.desc: Compares Incoming Items to those in the inventory below. Only allows Items that DO NOT match the tag name of renamed items to pass through the pedestal.
jei.pedestals.smelter.desc: Place an Inventory Below the Pedestal for item inputs, Drop Fuel Items on the Pedestal to fuel it, Outputs come out the top of the pedestal. Can Smelt anything a Vanila Furnace can
jei.pedestals.import.desc: Takes Items from a Below Inventory and Put them in the Pedestal, Will Also take items dropped on the pedestal and put them inside the pedestal.
jei.pedestals.fimport.desc: Checks if any items in the 'below' inventory can be sent to a connected pedestal. If true, it pulls those items out of the chest and into the pedestal for the pedestal to send off.
jei.pedestals.milker.desc: Place an Inventory Below the Pedestal for buckets, Will Milk any cows in the area around it, putting the milk buckets in the pedestal.
jei.pedestals.placer.desc: Takes Items from the inventory and places them below the pedestal if they can be placed. Range makes this place blocks farther below the pedestal.
jei.pedestals.quarry.desc: Place an Inventory Below the Pedestal for item inputs, Drop Fuel Items on the Pedestal to fuel it, Outputs come out the top of the pedestal. Will Only Mine Blocks that Match what is in the below inventory.
jei.pedestals.quarryb.desc: Place an Inventory Below the Pedestal for item inputs, Drop Fuel Items on the Pedestal to fuel it, Outputs come out the top of the pedestal. Will Only Mine Blocks that DO NOT Match what is in the below inventory.
jei.pedestals.restock.desc: Takes Items From the Pedestal, and only inserts them in the below inventory if items stacks need refilled, Will Not fill empty stacks. (Works Best when Paired with Crafting Upgrades)
jei.pedestals.frestock.desc: Only accepts items when stacks in the inventory 'below' need restocked. Takes Items From the Pedestal, and only inserts them in the below inventory if items stacks need refilled, Will Not fill empty stacks. (Works Best when Paired with Crafting Upgrades)
jei.pedestals.sawmill.desc: Place an Inventory Below the Pedestal for item inputs, Drop Fuel Items on the Pedestal to fuel it, Outputs come out the top of the pedestal. Saws Vanilla Wood Blocks Into other wood blocks, or sticks.
jei.pedestals.shearer.desc: Shears Sheep in the area around it, sheared wool is put into the pedestal.
jei.pedestals.teleporter.desc: Drop Chorus Fruit or Ender Pearls on the pedestal to Fuel it, This will teleport any entity that collides with it to underneith the pedestal its linked to, Will not teleport if there is no space below to teleport to. Range places the teleported entity that much farther below the linked pedestal. Lack of fuel for a teleport results in a failed teleport.
jei.pedestals.void.desc: Will Void all Items and Energy inserted or dropped on the pedestal, will also deal Void damage to any entity that touches the pedestal.
jei.pedestals.stone000.desc: R-Clicking a Pedestal with a Colored Pallet Will Make a Colored Pedestal.
jei.pedestals.stone001.desc: R-Clicking a Pedestal with a Colored Pallet Will Make a Colored Pedestal.
jei.pedestals.stone002.desc: R-Clicking a Pedestal with a Colored Pallet Will Make a Colored Pedestal.
jei.pedestals.stone003.desc: R-Clicking a Pedestal with a Colored Pallet Will Make a Colored Pedestal.
jei.pedestals.stone010.desc: R-Clicking a Pedestal with a Colored Pallet Will Make a Colored Pedestal.
jei.pedestals.stone011.desc: R-Clicking a Pedestal with a Colored Pallet Will Make a Colored Pedestal.
jei.pedestals.stone012.desc: R-Clicking a Pedestal with a Colored Pallet Will Make a Colored Pedestal.

jei.pedestals.stone312.desc: R-Clicking a Pedestal with a Colored Pallet Will Make a Colored Pedestal.

jei.pedestals.stone320.desc: R-Clicking a Pedestal with a Colored Pallet Will Make a Colored Pedestal.
jei.pedestals.stone321.desc: R-Clicking a Pedestal with a Colored Pallet Will Make a Colored Pedestal.
jei.pedestals.stone322.desc: R-Clicking a Pedestal with a Colored Pallet Will Make a Colored Pedestal.
jei.pedestals.stone323.desc: R-Clicking a Pedestal with a Colored Pallet Will Make a Colored Pedestal.
jei.pedestals.stone330.desc: R-Clicking a Pedestal with a Colored Pallet Will Make a Colored Pedestal.
jei.pedestals.stone331.desc: R-Clicking a Pedestal with a Colored Pallet Will Make a Colored Pedestal.
jei.pedestals.stone332.desc: R-Clicking a Pedestal with a Colored Pallet Will Make a Colored Pedestal.
jei.pedestals.stone333.desc: Pedestals Can Be Placed on all 6 sides, Colored with Colored Pallets, Lit up with a Block of Glowstone, and Upgraded with Upgrades. Upgraded Pedestals Can be powered off with a Redstone Signal.
pedestals.pedestal_block.cant_color: Color Can't be set on Pedestals with Items, Light, Upgrades, or Linked Pedestals
enchantment.pedestals.upgradecapacity.de: Upgrades the transfer rate and/or buffer capacity of upgrades.
enchantment.pedestals.upgradespeed.desc: Modifies the upgrades base speed up to 20 times faster
enchantment.pedestals.upgraderange.desc: Modifies the 'vertical' / 'Y' range of an upgrades work area
enchantment.pedestals.upgradearea.desc: Modifies the AOE area of a pedestals 'work' area
enchantment.pedestals.upgradeadvanced.de: Can be applied to pedestals that can use an inventory below for inputs or outputs, will allow ANY entities inventory to use used
